Package professional.team17.com.professional.Activity

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddReview
    Allows the user to add a review to a user who has completed a task for them
    EditMyProfileActivity
    EditMyProfileActivity starts after user selects the UserMenuButton --> "Edit My Profile"
    LogInActivity
    Allows the user to log in or move to a signup activity
    MapsActivity
    Map Activity Handles functions relating to maps.
    MapsSearchLocationActivity
    MapsSearchLocationActivity Finds the location that the user typed in EditText field The following is a spinoff of Mitch Tablian's code in Google Maps & Google Places Course
    MapsSearchTasksActivity
    An activity which shows all tasks with status Requested and Bidded within 5km.
    MapsShowALocationActivity
    Show a location relating to a task
    MyProfileViewActivity
    MyProfileViewActivity displays information of current user
    Navigation
    Created by ag on 2018-03-26.
    NotificationActivity
    Shows the notifications relating to current user
    OtherProfileViewActivity
    OtherProfileViewActivity displays information of another user
    PhotoPicker
    This activity is specific used for add the photo to the profile.
    ProfileViewActivity
    Abstract class ProfileViewActivity generalizes MyProfileViewActivity and OtherProfileViewActivity
    providerCheckImage
    This activity is used to display the image from the download task.photos() basically its the same as the requester add photos but just for check no edit
    ProviderTaskListActivity
    An activity where the provider can see the tasks - with different ui depending On the task status, and input
    ProviderViewTask
    An activity where the provider can see the tasks - with different ui depending On the task status, and input
    RequesterAddTaskActivity
    An activity where a user in Requester mode can add a task with status "Requested".
    RequesterEditTaskActivity
    An activity where a user in Requester mode can edit a task with status "Requested".
    RequesterTaskActivity  
    RequesterViewListActivity
    An activity where the requester can view all of their tasks with status requested, bidded or assigned.
    RequesterViewTaskActivity
    The activity that is displayed when a user in the Requester role views one of their own tasks.
    SearchActivity
    An activity where the provider can search for tasks in either requested or bidded states ('open to bidding') On default it will display the most recently requested tasks/
    SignUpActivity
    Allows the user to create a new profile
    SplashActivity
    An empty activity which displays a splash screen and redirects to the main activity.
    TaskPhotoActivity
    Task PhotoActivity handles photos when adding them to task
